commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This is our school. Wait, you already came here yesterday, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (This is Aqours' school. I can finally meet all of them today.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I'm so nervous...)

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It seems like Kanan and the other third-years are in their classroom, so let's go see them first. They probably know more about Aqours.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Why's that?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The third-years started Aqours. They might be able to tell you something about Aqours' charm.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We're here! Morning Kanan, Dia, Mari.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Chika. Good morning.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Chika, you should at least excuse yourself when entering a classroom that is not your own.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yeah, yeah, yeah! Save the scolding for laterrrrr! Good morning, Chika-chi!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: And you...must be the rainbow student I heard about! Nice to meet you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: R-Rainbow?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Mari, don't give out weird nicknames like that. You'll catch people off guard.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Whoops, sorry!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Did you say rainbow because of the "Niji" in Nijigasaki?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Sorry for all this. This is her default, so don't worry about it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: R-Right...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, nice to meet you. I'm--

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Chika has informed us. I heard you traveled all the way from Tokyo to meet us. It must have been a long journey. Thank you for coming, and welcome.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: O-Oh, I'm just happy to finally meet you!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: If fans are coming to see us outside of our shows, we must have really hit the big time!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That's very arrogant of you, Mari. Popularity is a living thing. It's always changing.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We must not sit still but continuously strive--

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: *Sigh* Once Dia gets going...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yep, it's a given now.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Anyway, Chika told us you had some questions you wanted to ask?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes. I wanted to ask you all about Aqours' charm!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was so moved when I saw your performance with μ's. That show really got me into school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want to know the kind of charm one needs to put on such a wonderful show.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I came here because I wanted to know just how you do it.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh my gosh! What a passionate confession of love! I wish I recorded it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Uhhh...

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We are very honored you would say such generous things about our performance.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yeah. It makes it feel like all those days of tough practice and training have paid off.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: But the charm of Aqours, huh? That's a tough one.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: To be honest, I don't think we have a clear answer ourselves. We're always looking for our strengths and ways to let our fans enjoy themselves.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You said you were moved by our performance, but what specifically made you feel that way?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All of it! That's not specific at all, I know, but your singing, your dancing, your smiles, it's all so amazing. It wasn't just that, either. Well...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yeah, we want to know what comes after that "well," too.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Does that mean our audience understands? Yet, if we can't understand and consciously express it...

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: How about this? Stick around with us. Watch us up close and you might notice something we don't!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hang around you guys? Can I?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Of course! You can help with the Summer Festival prep, too. What do you say?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Mari! We couldn't impose such a--

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: But Dia, you were just whining that you wanted any help you could get!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I was not whining, I'll have you know! We could use some extra help, though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll do it! I want to help!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Thanks. This is great, we've been so incredibly busy.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Thank you very much for your help.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sure thing!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: All right! We can hang out so much now!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Right. If you're helping with the festival, you'll be here for a few days. You already stayed one night, but do you have a place to stay for a while?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: If you need a place to stay, how about Hotel Ohara? I'll give you a special deal!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Heh-heh-heh! Oh, Mariii.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yes, Chika-chi?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Our visitor here is already a guest of Tochiman Inn!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: After we went to Chika's ryokan yesterday, I ended up reserving a room.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, no! You did?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: S-Sorry...

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: No worries! Stay at our place next time you come to Numazu!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sure thing!
